metadata.name: standing in the dust
metadata.description:
Once this place was our safe haven  
Every week we camped here with two close friends and this tree and its beauty amazed us  
Now there is nothing left of it except a memory

Vivid memories are walking in my mind

Suddenly everything changed  
 And now that I see this picture, I understand that we, like this tree, understand the importance of life and freedom more, and even though we are standing in the dust, we continue for the better future.

Yes, I am standing in the dust but with hope
